text: Cottens was a municipality in Morges in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 July 2021, the former municipalities of Apples, Bussy-Chardonney, Cottens, Pampigny, Reverolle and SÃ©very merged to form the new municipality of Hautemorges.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 16 August 2021 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Cottens, Vaud
